name: 5 Stages
description:
'Welcome to the world of 5 stages! In this visual novel demo you will get to experience, just for a little while, the story of Jake King.

It all starts when Jake and his best friend Mary meet up at their town park for ' a “friends only birthday get together”. Mary gives Jake a necklace with and special pendant on it. Shortly after, while the two of them are walking home, Jake gets transported into a very strange void. From there he must go on a journey to find Mary, and meet four allies along the way. He will have to deal with clouds of space dust that can talk, difficult allies that don’t want to join your journey, a prison that he and some of his allies must escape from, a dangerous cult, and many other things!  Get ready for an amazing adventure that will take place in five different stages!

Please note:

  • This just a demo that only has only 15% of the final game in it.
  • I have only completed what is in the actual demo.
  • I will be giving updates about the games progress whenever anything worth talking about  or important happens.
  • I am open and ready to receive any sort criticism or response and welcome it.
  • I am a first time developer and this is my first ever project and I am trying my very best to 5 stages as good as possible!
  • If you would like to use this demo in any sort of recording or YouTube video that is fine, just make sure to credit me.
  • If you would feel any need to contact me I can be contacted at brownieg8484@gmail.com

I hope that you are ready to truly experience and enjoy 5 stages!
